content: space chain 2 repeat from * 5 more times skip 1 double_crochet 1 double_crochet in next double_crochet skip 1 double_crochet join with slip_stitch to top of beginning chain 3 9 9 10 10 10 11 f+1 mod bs 17 17 19 19 19 21 t-3 double_crochet round 4 chain 3 double_crochet in next double_crochet double_crochet in top of mod bs from previous round mod bs in next chain 2 space chain 2 *skip 1 double_crochet double_crochet in next double_crochet double_crochet in top of mod bead st from previous round mod bs in next chain 2 space chain 2 repeat from * 5 more times join with slip_stitch to top of beginning chain 3 9 9 10 10 10 11 f+1 mod bs 16 16 18 18 18 20 t-4 double_crochet repeat rounds repeat round 4 - 7 7 8 9 10 11 h times or until sleeve reaches desired length final round chain 2 half_double_crochet in top of mod bs 2 half_double_crochet in chain 2 space 1 half_double_crochet in each of next 2 double_crochet repeat this pattern around join with slip_stitch to top of beginning chain 2 40 40 45 45 45 50 5*f half_double_crochet sleeve 2 note in order to create a mirror-image of the spiral on sleeve 1 sleeve 2 is worked in a stitch pattern that is a mirror-image of how you work sleeve 1 turn work so that unworked short side is at the top and wrong of work is facing you join yarn at right-hand corner bring corners together toward you and join with a slip_stitch work as sleeve 1 with 2 modifications round 1 chain 3 double_crochet in side of foundation row 2 double_crochet in side of half_double_crochet chain 2 *mod bs in next double_crochet 2 double_crochet in side of next half_double_crochet chain 2 repeat from * around to last double_crochet mod bs in double_crochet 2 double_crochet in side of next half_double_crochet join with slip_stitch to beginning chain 3 9 9 10 10 10 11 f+1 mod bs 22 22 24 24 24 26 t double_crochet round 2 chain 3 double_crochet in each of the next 2 double_crochet *chain 2 skip 1 double_crochet mod bs in chain 2 space double_crochet in mod bs © 2008 andrea moberly of previous round double_crochet in next double_crochet repeat from * around join with a slip_stitch to beginning chain 3 9 9 10 10 10 11 f+1 mod bs 19 19 21 21 21 23 t-1 double_crochet round 3 chain 5 counts as double_crochet + chain 2 skip 2 double_crochet mod bs in chain 2 space double_crochet in mod bs of previous round double_crochet in next double_crochet *chain 2 skip 1 double_crochet mod bs in chain 2 space double_crochet in mod bs of previous round double_crochet in next double_crochet repeat from * around join with a slip_stitch to 3rd chain of beginning chain 5 9 9 10 10 10 11 f+1 mod bs 17 17 19 19 19 21 t-3 double_crochet round 4 chain 3 mod bs in
